summary.span: 为 提供基实现。

span.span: Provides a base implementation for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是用于组件编辑器页包含一个空的窗口的完整实现。The class is a complete implementation for a component editor page that consists of an empty window. 您可以扩展此页后，可以添加自己的控件。You can extend this page to add your own controls. 可供的。 is used by a of a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的示例实现。The following code example demonstrates an example implementation. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void EnterLoadingMode() cil managed

summary.span: 递增加载计数器的计数。

span.span: Increments the loading counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行加载或初始化每个过程应首先调用方法，以指示，它将加载的内容之前编辑器可以显示加载的编辑器页。Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page. 当加载过程，调用完成后，应调用方法，以指示完成加载过程的一部分。When a loading procedure that called completes, it should call the method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed. 属性用作一个计数器来确定何时加载已完成。The property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete. 在页处于加载模式下，如果的值属性为非零。A page is in loading mode if the value of the property is non-zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ExitLoadingMode() cil managed

summary.span: 递减加载计数器的计数。

span.span: Decrements the loading counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行加载或初始化每个过程应首先调用方法，以指示，它将加载的内容之前编辑器可以显示加载的编辑器页。Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page. 当加载过程，调用完成后，应调用方法，以指示完成加载过程的一部分。When a loading procedure that called completes, it should call the method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed. 属性用作一个计数器来确定何时加载已完成。The property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete. 在页处于加载模式下，如果的值属性为非零。A page is in loading mode if the value of the property is non-zero.

span.span: The message to process.

summary.span: 处理可由页处理的消息。

span.span: Processes messages that could be handled by the page.

returns.span: 如果页处理了消息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the page processed the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使页面有机会处理消息之前调用方将使用它们。This method gives the page a chance to process messages before the caller uses them. 如果此方法返回`true`，消息将已使用，否则为调用方将继续处理该消息。If this returns `true`, the message will be consumed; otherwise, the caller will continue to process the message.

summary.span: 指示到完成加载为止共保留了多少个加载依赖项。

span.span: Indicates how many load dependencies remain until loading has been completed.

value.span: 所保留的加载依赖项的数目。

span.span: The number of remaining load dependencies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于跟踪剩余的加载阶段的数目。This property is used to track the number of loading stages remaining. 每个进程需要完全加载文档，此计数器递增之前开始加载，并减少每个加载进程时完成。For each process needed to completely load the document, this counter is incremented before loading begins, and decremented when each loading process completes.
